mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password_hash, phone, email, introduce, nickname, headpic) VALUES (#{userName}, #{passwordHash}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{introduce}, #{nickName}, #{headPic})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username as userName, password_hash as passwordHash, phone, email, created_at as createAt, introduce, nickname as nickName, headpic as headPic FROM users WHERE username = #{userName}
